articles.title: US 're-anchoring' to energy, power will benefit this company
articles.mainIdea: US 're-anchoring' to energy, power will benefit this company
articles.summary: Yahoo Finance Video: US 're-anchoring' to energy, power will benefit this company. William Blair Group head of energy and power technologies sector, Jed Dorsheimer, joins Opening Bid host Brian Sozzi to discuss the energy sector (XLE) and utilities sector (XLU), especially as they relate to artificial intelligence (AI) data center build-outs. In Dorsheimer's view, one company in particular is poised to benefit from the US's inevitable focus on energy and power. Watch the video above to hear more. To watch more expert insights and analysis on the latest market action, check out more Opening Bid. Related tickers mentioned: GEV, XLE, XLK.
